name: undercooked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not cooked enough: People can become infected after eating raw or undercooked meat. To make a nice soft cookie they should be slightly undercooked. See
undercook
More examplesFewer examplesAvoid restaurant dishes made with raw or undercooked eggs.The fish should remain pink and undercooked in the middle. Undercooked chicken is very dangerous and can lead to severe stomach upsets.
